lead_paragraph: It does not seem to be settled, after all, that Col. JEFFERSON DAVIS is to take QUITMAN'S place as candidate for Governor of Mississippi. He has only been nominated by a Convention in one County, and it is not certain he would accept, even if he should get, the nomination.
abstract: Union Candidate for Govr. of Miss.
